document.full_text: the new york attorney general is investigating colleges run by corinthian colleges and real estate magnate donald trump, adding to the list of states probing illegal business practices at for-profit schools.
document.title: new york probing corinthian, trump's for-profit colleges
lines_and_colors: the new york attorney general is investigating colleges run by corinthian colleges and real estate magnate donald trump, adding to the list of states probing illegal business practices at for-profit schools.
